name: The Code (D.B.M INC)
description:
In recent years, the entire human society is shifting towards a future that we can imagine. There are numerous science fictions are created for it:  Artificial Intelligence, Brain Computer Interface, Cyberpunk, these topics are starting to lead the trend.

However, when we achieve immortality,  does it also mean the extinction for the human species? 

A secret scientist try to intervene this significant historical turning point through changing the public / social opinion. By typing in accurate code to boost the supporting rate for anti-mechanisation, this is not a one man war, this is a turning point for the human race.
